scripts.start: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register src/main.ts
scripts.dev: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon --inspect=5859 -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register src/main.ts
scripts.build: mkdir -p build ; npx quicktype --lang schema ../shared/api-schema/*.ts -o build/api-schema.json
